ARABIC: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What is in the heavens and in the earth belongs to Allah. Allah suffices as a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For all that is in the heavens and the earth belongs to God; and God is sufficient as guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth; and Allah suffices for help and protection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. God is a totally Sufficient Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah is Sufficient as a Trustee (of affairs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And Allah is Ever All-Sufficient as Disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's, and Allah is sufficient as a Protector.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth; God suffices for a guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth. And Allah is sufficient as Defender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All that the heavens and the earth contain belongs to God; and none is as worthy of trust as God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah's is whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth, and sufficeth Allah as a Champion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah suffices as trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yea, unto Allah belong all things in the heavens and on earth, and enough is Allah to carry through all affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And Allah is Ever All-Sufficient as a Disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs all that is in heaven and earth. It is sufficient that Allah is a Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belongs everything in the heavens and everything on earth. God suffices as Manager.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:132] To God belongs all that is in the heavens and in the earth (He has repeated this in order to reaffirm [the reason] why fear of God is necessary); God suffices as a Guardian, witnessing the fact that what is contained in them belongs to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth) of created beings. (And Allah is sufficient as Defender) as Lord.
